summary: Align toysoldiers glossary with High Command doctrine

directives.details: Pull the latest `planning/glossary.md` from high_command_ai_0 and diff it against toysoldiers_ai_0/planning/glossary.md to identify gaps or local-only terminology.

Update the toysoldiers glossary to include missing shared definitions and clearly mark any field-specific additions under a "Toysoldiers Addenda" heading. Reference the shared terminology for future updates.
Submit acknowledgement/report noting glossary synchronisation and listing any retained field-exclusive entries so High Command can review them.
